message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm happy to start the price at $20,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. That's my maximum budget for this purchase.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm hoping for. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's as high as I can go.
